name: rush Chef cookbook
readme:
= DESCRIPTION:

Installs `rush`, the Ruby Shell.

For more information about Rush, see: http://rush.heroku.com/

= USAGE:

After including the recipe "rush" in the run list, you can set up a user with their default shell set to Rush.

    user "jtimberman" do
      shell "/usr/bin/rush"
    end
